Package com.google.errorprone

Class BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper

java.lang.Object
com.google.errorprone.BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper
@CheckReturnValue
public class BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper
extends Object
Compare a file transformed as suggested by BugChecker to an expected source.

Inputs are a BugChecker instance, input file and expected file.

Author:
kurs@google.com (Jan Kurs)

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper.ExpectOutput
    To assert the proper .addInput().addOutput() chain.
    static interface  BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper.FixChooser
    For checks that provide multiple possible fixes, chooses the one that will be applied for the test.
    static class  BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper.FixChoosers
    Predefined FixChoosers for selecting a fix by its position in the list
    static class  BugCheckerRefactoringTestHelper.TestMode
    Test mode for matching refactored source against expected source.
